gpt_comment: [PARTIAL] Agreement. The only accessible source, Meteoblue, suggests slightly higher temperatures (26.6°C vs 22.3°C) without mentioning precipitation or wind. However, the temperature difference is not material. It seems like it'll be a bit warmer than expected, perfect for a stroll along the Seine.
